import { Component,Input } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../../../shared/interfaces/User'; import { Product } from '../../../shared/interfaces/Product'; @Component({ selector: 'list-table', templateUrl: './table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./table.component.css'] }) export class TableComponent { @Input() headers: any[] = []; @Input() items: any[] = []; }
